title: Integrated Remote Language Learning System Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Smartphone Utilization Skills and Online Learning Experience
context.additional_context: Training course on designing integrated platforms to optimize language learning under Indonesia's New Normal, focusing on smartphone-based learning in PC-unavailable environments

learning_goals: Learners can design core features of e-learning applications that support blended learning environments
Learners can plan a language learning content distribution system accessible without time constraints
Learners can develop learning scenarios integrating VR-based simulations and online lecture materials

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
